text: Anyone here interested in featuring themselves on a webinar on October 1? Looking for a co-host to launch a sales ops service. Shouldn’t be more than a few hours of *paid work*. Just need you to show up! 10+ years of related experience in sales or CRM management would be ideal. Lmk!
<@U07JFKC9V08>, I agree with Olia, Roman would be a great choice!
Ryan, I'm not the right guy for this but I think it would be helpful if you shared some more details about yourself / the webinar

<@U01QVR44MEY> thanks for the reply; you’re absolutely right. The brief is here: <https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QB-XiO1ge0B34u8tgg-m3q7_MKe_XHghD_sMmQz03yw/edit?usp=sharing|https://docs.google.com/document/d/1QB-XiO1ge0B34u8tgg-m3q7_MKe_XHghD_sMmQz03yw/edit?usp=sharing>

A little about me: Ryan Murphy, Founder of Upfront Ops: With nearly 10 years of experience in CRM management and marketing operations across multiple platforms, Ryan has helped businesses optimize their sales processes and achieve remarkable growth regardless of their CRM choice.

*Hey everyone,* :wave:
I'm a full stack developer with 8 years of experience in building dynamic web applications. I’m currently on the lookout for new opportunities and am excited to bring my skills to a team where I can contribute to innovative projects.
If anyone knows of any openings or is interested in collaborating, feel free to reach out! I'm open to both full-time positions and freelance gigs.
Looking forward to connecting with you all!
